title: Psychedelics with Sam Harris
description:
Sam Harris joins the pod again to discuss psychedelics — including his experience with LSD and psilocybin — and shares his thoughts on who should and shouldn’t take them. He also explains how these drugs can provide you with a profound perspective on life, give you clarity, and help you hit the reset button. Follow Sam on Twitter, @SamHarrisOrg.
Scott opens with how big tech entering healthcare is exactly what dispersion is meant to do.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
